question: Give me all documentaries and short films with a 500K budget.
sql_query1:
SELECT Films.Title 
FROM Films
WHERE (Films.FilmType = "Documentary" OR Films.FilmType = "Short Film") AND Films.Budget = 500000.0
sql_query2:
SELECT Films.Title 
FROM Films
WHERE Films.FilmType = "Documentary" OR Films.FilmType = "Short Film" AND Films.Budget = 500000.0
interpretation1: Show films classed as either documentary or short film where either has a 500K budget.
interpretation2: Show all the documentary films, in addition show just those short films which had a 500K budget.
